item.title: Nagasaki
item.description: Nagasaki is a Modernist monospaced display typeface in the tradition of space-age exploration and futurism. The font is exclusively distributed by UK foundry HypeForType as part of their Exclusive Faces range.
item.content:encoded: Nagasaki is a Modernist monospaced display typeface in the tradition of space-age exploration and futurism. The font is exclusively distributed by UK foundry HypeForType as part of their Exclusive Faces range.

item.title: Envisioning. The App.
item.description: Interaction designers can be inspired by movies, a source they already love, and can learn from the interfaces in films and television. --- After an initial phase of just unreflected citation of existing technology or simple ex-trapolation without conceptual changes, technology started to inspire filmmakers. They invented interesting variations or pointed out the consequences of failures (or total success) of technologies, and thereby provided inspiration for researchers all the same. --- The app provides an easy-to-use access to various movie clips, connected with in-depth information about facts and fiction. --- »Swipe. Tap. Get comfy. Get inspired.« The iPad App »Envisioning« is part of my diploma thesis about the Human-Computer-Interaction in Science-Fiction movies. www.factsandfiction.info
item.content:encoded: Interaction designers can be inspired by movies, a source they already love, and can learn from the interfaces in films and television. --- After an initial phase of just unreflected citation of existing technology or simple ex-trapolation without conceptual changes, technology started to inspire filmmakers. They invented interesting variations or pointed out the consequences of failures (or total success) of technologies, and thereby provided inspiration for researchers all the same. --- The app provides an easy-to-use access to various movie clips, connected with in-depth information about facts and fiction. --- »Swipe. Tap. Get comfy. Get inspired.« The iPad App »Envisioning« is part of my diploma thesis about the Human-Computer-Interaction in Science-Fiction movies. www.factsandfiction.info

item.title: YARA the yogini
item.description: This is a project created for the enchanted doll contest. The contest called for creating a new character or costume to fit into the existing enchanted doll line of porcelain BJD dolls.
item.content:encoded: This is a project created for the enchanted doll contest. The contest called for creating a new character or costume to fit into the existing enchanted doll line of porcelain BJD dolls.

item.title: Nerd PC-MAC . winner General Optica young talent award
item.description: Winner of the General Optica young talents award in 2006. the collection talk about nerds: Nerd PC more retro and vintage Nerd Mac sofisticated and retrofuturistic.
item.content:encoded: Winner of the General Optica young talents award in 2006. the collection talk about nerds: Nerd PC more retro and vintage Nerd Mac sofisticated and retrofuturistic.

item.title: dua
item.description: Dua focuses on the distribution of a small furniture collection designed by young artists. Mostly all items are characterized by high functionality and a clean approach. This characteristics very essential for the brand had to be taken into account developing the corporate design, a brochure and the companies website. Client: Dua Year: 2008/2009 Art-Direction: Raffael Stüken Grafik-Design: Raffael Stüken Coding: Raffael Stüken Photography: Tanja Evers Awards: Red Dot Award 2009 (website) Design Award of the Federal Republic of Germany 2010, nominated (website) CSS Award, site of the day (website) European Design Award 2010, finalist (brochure)
item.content:encoded: Dua focuses on the distribution of a small furniture collection designed by young artists. Mostly all items are characterized by high functionality and a clean approach. This characteristics very essential for the brand had to be taken into account developing the corporate design, a brochure and the companies website.
